item.title: Videographer for Media Interviews : June 26 in NYC - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture interviews with senior business leaders for RETHINK Retail. Interviews will be conducted at multiple sites in Manhattan on Wednesday, June 26...with a possible extension of 1 additional day, either Thursday or Friday. The videographer will be responsible for providing the equipment, setting up the equipment, managing the lighting and sound, and recording high-quality footage of the interviews. The videographer and equipment must be mobile–we will be shooting in multiple places during the day.

The final deliverables will be the raw audio and video(s) footage (we will not need editing). This is a great opportunity to showcase your videography skills and work with influential business leaders.

Requirements:
  - Bring and set up your own equipment: Cameras (2 minimum, 3 preferred), Lighting, Handheld Microphones (2 minimum), Lav Microphones (2 minimum)  
  - Proven experience as a videographer
  - Proficiency in operating professional video equipment
  - Strong understanding of lighting and sound techniques
  - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  - Ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines

Hourly Range: $50.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 22:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Videography
Skills: Business, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer and Video Editor for Online Jiu Jitsu Club Launch - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video shooter and editor to help us create a short launch video for our online Jiu Jitsu club. The video will be used to promote our club and attract new members. The ideal candidate should have experience in shooting and editing high-quality videos, with an ability to capture the essence of Jiu Jitsu and showcase our club's unique selling points. Attention to detail and creativity are key. This is a great opportunity to work with a passionate team and contribute to the growth of our club. As well as possibly secure a long term position in the future.

Skills required:
- Video shooting
- Video editing
- Attention to detail
- Creativity
- Knowledge of Jiu Jitsu


Posted On: June 24, 2024 22:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
